title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
hi
I am new to apple board fixing sow please be gentle. I have fixed other type of motherboards but no apple mb until now.
I have this mb: green light on charger for few second after turn to orange (with no battery connected) and no fan spin ( i think this is normal at this model).
i have noticed a little area (like a drop of water) with corrosion on the following components :
r7742 ( 0 ohm had to replace) and
r7752, r7753 ( no component on motherboard only pad corroded)
there is no other area corroded , i have cleaned the board with ultrasound .... still nothing.
i have the following voltages and now i am stuck :

PPBUS_G3H 12.58V
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING 12.58
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER5V 12.58
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER3V3 12.58
PPBUS_S4_X239 0.00
PPVIN_S4_TPAD 0.00
PPDCIN_G3H_ISOL 15.17
PPDCIN_G3H 14.59
PP3V42_G3H 3.41
PPVRTC_G3H 3.34
PP5V_S5 5.024
PP3V3_S5 3.348
PP3V3_SUS 3.347
PP1V05_SUS 1.060
Smc_onoff_l 3.4 v


pm_slp_s4_l  0v
pm_slp_s5_l 0v


PP5V_S4 0v
PP3V3_S4 0v

U8000, U8050 area is like new

around u7501:
Pp5_s3_reg 5v
p3v3s5_drvh 3,3v
ppbus_s5_hs_ other3v3 12,5v
p5vp3v3_vreg 3,25v
s5_pwr_en 3,4v
sg_pwrgd 3,37v
p5vp3v3_skipsel 1,98v
p3v3s5_csp2 3,32v
p3v3s5_csn2 3,31v
p3v3s5_vfb2 1,8v
p3v3s5_comp2 1,95v
pp5v_s5 5v
p5vp3v3_vref2 1,98v
smc_pm_g2_en 3,4v
p5vs3_comp1 1,98v
p5vs3_vfb1 0v
p5vs3_csn1 0v
p5vs3_csp2 0v
p3v3s3_pgood 0v
p5vs3_en 0v
p3v3s5_rf 1,24v
pp5v_s3 0v
p5vs3_drvh 0v
p5vs3_ll 0v
p5vs3_vbst 4,78v
p5vs3_drvl 0v
p3v3s5_drvl 0v
p3v3s5_vbst 8,30v
p3v3s5_ll 3,31v
p3v3s5_drvh 3,32v
ppbus_s5_hs_other3v3 12,54v

on pin 3 (u7501) p3v3s5_rf is 1,24v ..... it is normal? not 3,3 v?

not sure this is relevant but SPIROM_USE_MLB   3.4v


i would appreciate any idea pls.... i am stuck
THX

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: Inspect U6100 area for corrosion. Are you using a 60W charger?

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
no corrosion  the area is like new ..
Charger is 60w and is the original one
pp3v3_sus is present on pin 8
Thx

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: allso the area around u1900 is clean  and no pads are corroded

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
Measure carefully on PP5V_S4 and see if there is a pules(s) right after connecting power. If not check PPVRTC.
Best to check this with a scope as multimeters are slow especially auto range ones.

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
just when i connect the charger PP5V_S4 is jumping once  an then stays down  
PPVRTC_g3h is 3.32v   constant

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: Check for shorts on s3 and s0 rails.

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
on PPVCC_S0_CPU  i have noticed that i have only 10.6 ohm  to ground  and, on diode measurement i have 0.0006v,  is this normal ? or the problem is around this ....
THX

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: i got this when i measure on L7310 and L7320  and c1088

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: sorry to many zero  0.006v

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: i have measured all s0 and s3 rails and  no short to ground .....

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: Does it run in SMC bypass mode? Hold down power button, plug in magsafe, wait 3 seconds, release power button, press power button again (should have a solid green light and fans will spin maximum)

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: How does pin 8 on U1950 look?

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
pin 8 on u 1950 is clean and pp3v42_g3h is present,
in smc bypass mode:
I hold the power button  connect the charger  - amber light, release button - solid green , press button nothing happens.(green turns to amber)
i have noticed that also PPVCC_S0_CPU is jumping when i connect the charger.

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: So CPU Vcore is pulsing. This usually means there is an issue with the SPI lines. Check all termination resistors and traces between them that go to U6100.

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: sorry my english is not so good. it is not pulsing only one jump when i connect the charger ... same thing whit other s0 and s3 voltages for example with p1v05s0_en, and the SPI lines are ok, clean and all the resistors have the correct values

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: Check all voltage rails for shorts to GND.

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
i have check  2 times for a short on all voltage rails and i was unable to find any shorts
bu t i have noticed  that
on pin 16 (u7501) there is 1.02v  but  before r7562 is 3.3v . on the schematic  says  3.3v  it is that ok ?
P5v_S5en is 3.4v ?

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: also on schematic PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING  is 8.5 v but i have 12.5v    is that normal?

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
PPBUS should be 12.6. I don't think you understand how R7562 circuit works.....

There is nothing I can do for this one but say termination resistors and traces in U6100 circuit, pin 8 on U1950. It could be 100 other things, inspect the board carefully. Pulsing power is THE worst issue to diagnose.

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
ieee I am the lucky one :( my first apple mb and is a nightmare
THX

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: PPVCC_S0_CPU i have noticed that i have only 10.6 ohm to ground and, on diode measurement i have 0.0006v, is this normal ?

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
I have noticed that on cpu_vccsense_n i have 0 volts to the ground ( on diode measurement) and 1.1 ohm to the ground,  both c7261 and  r0960 are ok is that normal ?
on u7200 i have  12.53 on pin 17 and 0.52 on pin 8(cpuvr_fb2)  nothing else

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
That is all normal. Power is pulsing so system is trying to boot up but fails. As said this could be 100 different thing. Most likely cases are U6100 and termination resistors/traces, crap under SMC, U1950 pin 8 or damaged/corroded resistor somewhere.
Nothing more really can be done in this case. Maybe upload some high-res pictures for assessment.

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message:
Thank_u for your patience.
After looking again and again through microscope seems that the only area with corrosion is r7752 and r7753 (seen in picture)
I also noticed that the only rails that are not jumping is pp5v_so, pp5v_s0_cpuvr, PP5v_S0_vmon  ( neither of these have short to ground)

title: 820-4924-A 2015 Retina 13in green light on charger no power on need some help
message: I still have no other ideas for you. U6100 has more to it than just that picture......
